definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Which kind of resources are used in Biomass energy projects?
sentences.chinese: 生物質能項目中會用到哪些資源？

sentences.english: Method for calculating re-utilizing degree of the biomass energy is presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中還給出了計算系統生物質能再利用程度的方法。

sentences.english: There is a brief introduction on industrialization of biomass energy technology in China.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡要介紹了我國生物質能技術產業化研究。

sentences.english: Biodiesel is a new kind of bio-energy.
sentences.chinese: 生物柴油是一種新型的生物質能源。

sentences.english: It is point out that study on the high-technology concerning bioenergy is key links in China.
sentences.chinese: 指出研發高新技術是我國生物質能發展的關鍵。

sentences.english: Thermo-chemical conversion is one of main way to convert biomass to energy.
sentences.chinese: 熱化學轉換是生物質能源化的主要途徑之一。
